p: Antioxidant capacity of phenolic extracts from EVOO samples was performed following Sgherri et al. (2016) using the radical cation ABTS (2,2′-azino-bis(3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulphonic acid)). The radical solution was prepared as described by Pellegrini et al. (1999), and a Trolox dose-response curve in the 0.2–1.5 mM range was used. Antioxidant activity was expressed as Trolox equivalent antioxidant capacity (TEAC) mL −1 extract.
